**Färdigheter och egenskaper för framgång**
 Du som person har starka analytiska och problemlösande färdigheter, kommunikationsförmågor för att uppnå resultat och trivs med att arbeta både självständigt och i team i en dynamisk arbetsmiljö.
   

  

**Kvalifikationer**
* Några års erfarenhet av finansiell förvaltning och lönehantering
* Mastersexamina i redovisning, företagsekonomi eller relaterat område
* God kunskap om redovisningsprinciper, finansiell rapportering och regulatoriska krav
* Erfarenhet av ERP-system och finansiell programvara (t.ex. SAP) samt lönesystem (t.ex. Visma HRPlus8)
* Flytande i svenska och engelska, i både tal och skrift


**Meriterande**
* Erfarenhet av arbete i medelstort till större företag som vårt
* Tidigare erfarenhet av att arbeta med internationella lönefrågor och anställda som arbetar utomlands


**Som person är du**
* Analytisk med en vilja att lösa komplexa problem
* Duktig på att kommunicera med olika typer av individer, både internt och externt
* Du har hög integritet och är självmotiverad samt proaktiv i att driva förbättringar


**Vad vi erbjuder dig**
 På EY kommer vi att hjälpa dig utveckla och anpassa dina färdigheter framåt utifrån en upplevelse i världsklass. Vi stärker dig i en flexibel miljö och låter dig och din kompentens blomma i en kultur som värdesätter mångfald och inkludering på en global nivå. Läs mer här.
   

  

**Är du redo att “
 *Shape your future with confidence”* 
 ? Ansök idag.**
 Då är du varmt välkommen att söka tjänsten. Skicka in din ansökan senast den 6 januari 2026. Vid frågor om tjänsten kontaktar du Henrik Hammar på henrik.hammar@se.ey.com. Vid frågor om rekryteringsprocessen kontaktar Simon Aspler på simon.aspler@se.ey.com.
   

  

 Observera att en bakgrundskontroll kommer att genomföras som en del av rekryteringsprocessen.
   

  

 På EY värdesätter vi mångfald och uppmuntrar ansökningar från individer från olika bakgrunder. Om du har frågor, behöver stöd, eller anpassning av rekryteringsprocessen på grund av en funktionsnedsättning, tveka inte på att kontakta oss på recruitmentsweden@se.ey.com. Vi finns här för att stötta dig.
   

  

**EY | Building a better working world**
 EY is building a better working world by creating new value for clients, people, society and the planet, while building trust in capital markets.
   

  

 Enabled by data, AI and advanced technology, EY teams help clients shape the future with confidence and develop answers for the most pressing issues of today and tomorrow.
   

  

 EY teams work across a full spectrum of services in assurance, consulting, tax, strategy and transactions. Fueled by sector insights, a globally connected, multi-disciplinary network and diverse ecosystem partners, EY teams can provide services in more than 150 countries and territories.

title: Sr Creative Executive, Nordic Originals, Amazon MGM Studios
description:
**Description**
 Are you passionate about creating world-class content and driving innovation in entertainment? Amazon MGM Studios is seeking an experienced Sr Creative Executive who will be responsible for supporting the evaluation, development, and delivery of original content while demonstrating ownership over a specific content vertical or territory.
   

  

 In this role, you will assist in identifying and championing compelling stories that resonate with our global customer base, while building and maintaining relationships with top-tier creative talent. You'll leverage data-driven insights alongside your creative intuition to make recommendations about content development for the Nordics.
   

  

 As a Sr Creative Executive, you'll work cross-functionally with multiple teams including Production, Business Affairs, Marketing, and Data Analytics to ensure projects move efficiently from development through production.
   

  

 Key job responsibilities
   

  

* Support the creative development process for a portfolio of original content
* Collaborate with creators, writers, and producers to help develop series and features
* Partner cross-functionally with Production, Business Affairs, and Marketing teams
* Provide actionable creative feedback throughout development and production
* Use data insights to support creative decisions while maintaining artistic integrity
* Scale development processes through documentation and best practices


**Basic Qualifications**
* Multiple years of entertainment industry experience in content development
* Track record of successfully developing and executing multiple content projects
* Experience providing creative notes and feedback to creators and stakeholders
* Demonstrated ability to identify marketable creative elements in pitches and submissions
* Strong editorial judgment and story development skills
* Experience managing writer and talent relationships
* Proven ability to give constructive script notes that elevate material
* History of successfully packaging and developing IP into viable content
* Fluency in Swedish and English


**Preferred Qualifications**
* Demonstrated ability to identify and nurture compelling, commercially viable stories
* Strong narrative instincts and ability to provide incisive script notes
* Experience working with data-driven decision making tools
* Proven track record of packaging projects with high-profile talent
* Excellent understanding of story structure across various formats (series, features, limited series)
* Ability to articulate creative vision and align stakeholders around it
* Experience supporting a development slate and prioritizing projects
* Strong knowledge of current market trends and emerging storytelling techniques
* Prior experience at a major streaming service, studio, or network
* Proficiency in evaluating and developing content across multiple genres


 Amazon is an equal opportunities employer. We believe passionately that employing a diverse workforce is central to our success. We make recruiting decisions based on your experience and skills. We value your passion to discover, invent, simplify and build. Protecting your privacy and the security of your data is a longstanding top priority for Amazon. Please consult our Privacy Notice (https://www.amazon.jobs/en/privacy\_page) to know more about how we collect, use and transfer the personal data of our candidates.
   

  

 Our inclusive culture empowers Amazonians to deliver the best results for our customers. If you have a disability and need a workplace accommodation or adjustment during the application and hiring process, including support for the interview or onboarding process, please visit https://amazon.jobs/content/en/how-we-hire/accommodations for more information. If the country/region you’re applying in isn’t listed, please contact your Recruiting Partner.
   

  

  

**Company** 
 - Amazon Corporate Services Sweden AB
   

  

 Job ID: A3083119

title: Sales Manager Cloud & Software
description:
****Why choose TD SYNNEX:****
 As a
 **Fortune 500 global company** 
 operating in over 100 countries, TD SYNNEX values its diverse workforce of 24,000 employees. As the world's largest IT distributor, our mission is to deliver top-class technology solutions that enable businesses and individuals to navigate the digital world in a safe and efficient way. In addition,
 **TD SYNNEX Nordics is a certified "Great Place To Work" in all 4 Nordic countries.**
**About the Role**
 We are looking for a Sales Manager to lead our Cloud & Software team in Solna. The team consists of 5 talented sales professionals covering AWS, Google Cloud, Data & AI solutions. This role is about coaching people, setting direction, and inspiring the team to reach the next level.
   

  

**What You Will Do**
* Lead, coach, and develop a
 **team of 5 sales professionals.**
* Drive growth across
 **AWS, Google, and Data & AI solution** 
 areas.
* Set clear goals, track performance, and remove roadblocks.
* Act as a partner to vendors and internal stakeholders to strengthen go-to-market.
* Support account strategy, customer meetings, and QBRs when needed.
* Foster a culture of collaboration, accountability, and continuous learning.


**What We Are Looking For**
* Proven track record in sales leadership, ideally in cloud or software.
* **Strong coaching skills** 
 - you are a leader, not just a manager.
* Commercial understanding of AWS, Google Cloud, and Data & AI offerings.
* Ability to work strategically while staying close to the team's day-to-day reality.
* Excellent communication skills in Swedish and English.


****What We Offer:****
**Hybrid work (2- 3 days per week at the office)**
 We value continuous learning and provide a clear progression plan.
   

  

 We provide
 **comprehensive benefits** 
 including
 **health insurance** 
 , retirement plans, and more
   

  

  

  

  

**Key Skills**
 At TD SYNNEX, our values guide everything we do: Together, We Own It, We Dare to Go, We Grow and Win, and above all, We Do the Right Thing. These principles shape how we work with each other, our partners, and our communities as we drive innovation and create lasting impact.
   

  

**What's In It For You?**
* **Elective Benefits:** 
 Our programs are tailored to your country to best accommodate your lifestyle.
* **Grow Your Career:** 
 Accelerate your path to success (and keep up with the future) with formal programs on leadership and professional development, and many more on-demand courses.
* **Elevate Your Personal Well-Being:** 
 Boost your financial, physical, and mental well-being through seminars, events, and our global Life Empowerment Assistance Program.
* **Diversity, Equity & Inclusion:** 
 It's not just a phrase to us; valuing every voice is how we succeed. Join us in celebrating our global diversity through inclusive education, meaningful peer-to-peer conversations, and equitable growth and development opportunities.
* **Make the Most of our Global Organization** 
 : Network with other new co-workers within your first 30 days through our onboarding program.
* **Connect with Your Community:** 
 Participate in internal, peer-led inclusive communities and activities, including business resource groups, local volunteering events, and more environmental and social initiatives.


**Don't meet every single requirement? Apply anyway.**
 At TD SYNNEX, we're proud to be recognized as a great place to work and a leader in the promotion and practice of diversity, equity and inclusion. If you're excited about working for our company and believe you're a good fit for this role, we encourage you to apply. You may be exactly the person we're looking for!

title: SECURITY ENGINEER DETECT & RESPONSE TILL BANKGIROT
description:
*Bankgirot söker nu en Security Engineer till en växande del av organisationen i Stockholm. Bankgirot har en unik ställning på Sveriges betalmarknad som nu genomgår den största transformationen i modern tid. Vår IT-organisation är i en tillväxtfas för att utveckla framtidssäkrade lösningar som följer internationell standard och regelverk.*
*Samtidigt ser vi till att det nuvarande betalsystemet fungerar säkert och stabilt – varje dag. Arbetet med att utveckla framtidens betalinfrastruktur är i full gång och vi behöver dig som vill vara en del av resan. Som Security Engineer med fokus på detect & respnse spelar du en central roll i att säkerställa skyddet för våra klient- och servermiljöer – på ett teknikbolag där vi har ett stort hjärta för uppdraget – och för varandra.*
 Din roll
   

  

 Som Security Engineer arbetar du operativt med att övervaka, förbättra och drifta säkerhetslösningar för våra endpoints – både klient- och servermiljöer – i syfte att upptäcka och hantera hot i ett tidigt skede. Du har en viktig roll i sårbarhetshantering, patchkoordination och teknisk efterlevnad, och verkar i nära samarbete med SIRT, driftorganisation och andra säkerhetsfunktioner.
   

  

 Arbetet innebär ansvar för lösningar som EDR, Vulnerability Management, loggplattformar och analysverktyg – samt deltagande i incidenthantering och säkerhetsutredningar. Du driver förbättringar av rutiner, dokumentation och tekniska kontroller, och arbetar kontinuerligt med att minska attackytor och öka motståndskraften i vår IT-miljö. Dina huvudsakliga fokusområden är att:
   

  

* Övervaka och drifta säkerhetslösningar som EDR, Vulnerability Management, loggplattformar och EDR-integrationer
* Delta i analys, rapportering och utredning av virus, sårbarheter och incidenter i klient- och servermiljö
* Koordinera patchhantering i samarbete med driftteam samt följa upp teknisk efterlevnad
* Utveckla och dokumentera säkerhetsrutiner och skyddsåtgärder kopplat till endpointmiljöer


 Vi söker dig som har
   

  

 Du har ett säkerhetstänk som spänner över både infrastruktur och applikation, och är van vid att arbeta i komplexa IT-miljöer med höga krav på säkerhet och tillgänglighet. Ditt arbetssätt präglas av struktur, analys och ett starkt fokus på att förebygga och hantera tekniska hot mot verksamheten.
   

  

 Vi ser att du har erfarenhet av att arbeta med EDR-lösningar såsom Defender eller SentinelOne, och är bekväm med sårbarhetshantering och endpointskydd i både Windows- och Linuxmiljöer. Du har god förståelse för malwarebeteende, logganalys och incidentrespons, samt insikt i vilka säkerhetskrav som ställs på drift av klienter och servrar. Det är meriterande om du har certifieringar inom cybersäkerhet, såsom CompTIA Security+, GIAC eller CISSP.
   

  

 Som person är du lösningsorienterad, noggrann och har ett genuint intresse för cybersäkerhet. Du arbetar strukturerat och analytiskt, trivs i en operativ roll och har god kommunikations- och samarbetsförmåga. Du ser värdet i tvärfunktionellt samarbete, är öppen för förändring och bidrar gärna till nya och förbättrade lösningar med säkerheten i fokus.
   

  

 Ett utvecklande arbete med bra förmåner
   

  

 Som vår nya kollega blir du en del av ett kompetent och positivt team där vi samarbetar och sätter högt värde på varandras kompetens och erfarenheter.
   

  

 Vi satsar mycket på hälsa och välmående och erbjuder generösa förmåner för dig som medarbetare.
   

  

 Övrig information
   

  

 Tjänsten är en tillsvidareanställning baserad i Liljeholmen i Stockholm. Du behöver ha goda kunskaper i svenska och engelska.
   

  

 Innan anställning beslutas genomförs en säkerhetsprövning enligt säkerhetsskyddslagen (2018:585).
   

  

 Intresserad?
   

  

 I denna rekrytering samarbetar Bankgirot med Nexer Recruit.
   

  

 Har du frågor eller funderingar? Kontakta gärna rekryteringskonsult Johanna Värmfors: johanna.varmfors@nexergroup.com eller +46 730 821 230 alternativt Jenny Nilsson: jenny.nilsson@nexergroup.com eller +46 703 018 279.
   

  

 Läs om fler lediga tjänster från Bankgirot här.
   

  

 Vi ser fram emot din ansökan!
   

  

 Om Bankgirot
   

  

 Bankgirot är ett svenskt clearinghus och teknikbolag med över 60 års erfarenhet av att leverera finansiell infrastruktur till banker. I samverkan med betalsektorn ser vi till att privatpersoner och företag enkelt kan göra överföringar och betalningar.
   

  

 Bankgirot säkerställer att det nuvarande betalsystemet fungerar felfritt, samtidigt som vi utvecklar framtidssäkrade lösningar. Vi säkrar och utvecklar Sveriges betalningar.
   

  

 Läs mer på www.bankgirot.se

title: Senior Relationship Manager (Strategic Accounts)
description:
Mentimeter is an engagement tool with a clear goal in mind. To turn presentations into conversations. Through real-time interactivity and clear visualizations, we get people to participate, engage and become more productive. Transforming all those passive meetings, airless classrooms and drawn out trainings into valuable and memorable moments.
   

  

 We truly believe that you achieve the best results by doing things together. And that successful leaders need to adopt a curious and collaborative mindset in order to get there. So with you at Mentimeter, you’ll be a big part of the ambition to help over 1 billion people listen, learn and work better together.
   

  

**Senior Relationship Manager (Strategic Accounts)**
**Please note:** 
 This role is a
 **commercial sales position** 
 , with ownership of
 **revenue targets and sales quotas**
 Mentimeter has grown fast within the Enterprise customer segment in the past years. Today, our Relationship Managers manage more than 1 000 existing Enterprise customers with support from our Customer Success Managers. With this growth, we have seen an increased demand for organisations to roll out Mentimeter on a wider scale. This has led to an internal need of driving bigger commercial discussions, and strategically developing partnerships with some of our largest Enterprise customers. To cater for this need, and to facilitate the growth of this customer segment, we are now looking for a Senior Relationship Manager to drive strategic sales processes with our Key accounts.
   

  

**Responsibilities For This Role**
* Manage a book of 10-15 Key Accounts with full commercial responsibility
* Develop and leverage relationships with C-level stakeholders and key influencers in various departments/teams/regions all over the world
* Full commercial responsibility of revenue retention & growth by building a strong pipeline, while serving as a trusted adviser to our customers
* Manage a continuous forecast & risk management of key renewals
* Ownership of renewals of ongoing agreements in order to prevent churn
* Ability to assess business opportunities and use data in order to support decision-making towards customers
* Drive a strategy for best-in-class scalable customer success
* Understand customer needs and ability to translate that into product fit
* Collaborate together with Senior Customer Success Managers for our strategic enterprise customers
* Act as a bridge between sales, product and business development in order to proactively seek improvement of our Enterprise offering and be the voice of your customers
* Act as an internal expert through sharing knowledge and learnings with the sales team, assist sales team in high level discussions and develop sales best practices


**Resources We Have To Support You**
* World-class lead generation from the Marketing and Product teams
* Marketing and Sales team to support in analysis and tactics
* A Sales Operations, Sales Enablement and Business Development department who provides projects to continuously support the sales team
* Professional toolstack (Intercom, Mixpanel, Google Analytics, Salesforce, SalesLoft, PlanHat, Looker, Hex)


**Skills & Requirements**
**Must-haves for the role:**
* 5+ years of sales experience, including 2+ years experience from key account sales and leading complex, strategic sales processes towards an international customer base
* Experience in SaaS sales
* Ability to assess business opportunities and use data to make informed decisions and persuade others
* Passion for building long-term relationships as well as driving commercial initiatives with customers
* Knowledge of software contract terms and conditions with the ability to create fair transactions
* Strong business acumen with the ability to quickly understand and conduct research on your accounts
* Communication & Stakeholder Management with a proven track record in successfully addressing C-suite executives
* Strong negotiation, pipeline and forecasting skills
* Ability to manage customers simultaneously while positioning company products against direct and indirect competitors
* You are required to have professional-level English (we sell to 150+ countries today)
* Excellent communication skills


**Nice To Have**
* Bachelor or master’s degree (field not important)
* Strategic Accounts SaaS sales experience


**Not Required**
* You don’t have to know Swedish (we are an English-first organization, daily work is carried out in English and the Mentimeter team currently boasts over 20 different nationalities!)


 Please note that this position is located onsite at our Stockholm HQ, with starting date being flexible yet ideally as soon as possible.
   

  

**Responsibilities Not Included In This Role**
* Closing new customer contracts (Account Executives does that)
* Roll-out and adoption of our enterprise solution with our customers is mainly done by Customer Success Managers (Although for certain accounts that will be done by Relationship Managers as well)
* Day-to-day support (We have minimal support, and a support specialist is responsible for this)


**Compensation Model**
 We strongly believe in the power of togetherness, and we put a lot of effort into collaboration, teamwork and helping each other whenever needed. We believe that every part of Mentimeter, from Sales Development Representatives and Account Executives to Frontend Developers and Marketing Managers contributes equally to our continued success. To foster and emphasize this culture and way of working, we apply a non-commission-based salary model in our sales roles, which has proven to be very successful and appreciated across the team. You can read about our benefits and perks here.
   

  

**What Mentimeter Can Offer**
 At Mentimeter we can offer a diverse and inclusive work environment supported by smart and driven colleagues. We believe in continuous professional development for all of our colleagues and therefore offer access to a leadership program (including external personal coach) and relevant education to ensure that we continue to be state-of-the-art when it comes to innovating and building Mentimeter. Your place will be in a growing company with lots of career opportunities, working on a beloved product used by more than 300 million people. It’s not all about work though, we also offer a very healthy view on work-life balance.
   

  

 All of this comes attached with a competitive compensation and benefits package, including pension contributions. Learn more about our benefits by visiting our Benefits & Perks page
   

  

**AI and Hiring at Mentimeter**
 At Mentimeter, we believe AI helps us work smarter - but it never replaces the human assessment, curiosity, and personal connection that define our culture and our hiring. We use AI as a sparring partner: to bounce ideas, bring new perspectives, support structure, and make our work more efficient. But the meaning, decisions, and interactions always come from people.
   

  

* AI does not screen or decide on candidates.
* There is no automated filtering, ranking, or decision-making in our recruitment process. Every application is reviewed by a person.
* Hiring teams may use AI to support their work - for example, to structure notes, prepare interview questions, or organize their thinking.


 AI strengthens our work, but it does not define it. At Mentimeter, we’re not building an AI-driven hiring process - we’re building a people-first culture, where technology helps us listen, learn, and grow together.
   

  

**Culture at Mentimeter**
 At Mentimeter we believe in giving everyone a voice - regardless of who you are. So we build a platform that does just that. Our platform is not only our product but also our organization. A platform where people feel safe, where differences are embraced, a place where you can have fun. We strongly encourage applicants who are people of color, LGBTQ+, women, people with disabilities, and/or formerly incarcerated people, and a college degree is not strictly required. In order to give everyone a voice, we need to be as diverse as our users.
   

  

 Learn more about our culture by visiting our Culture page.
   

  

 Review our Privacy Policy for more information.

title: Business Development Manager GCC - Server, Storage & Network
description:
**Business Development Manager GCC - server, storage & network**
 Brinner du för försäljning och älskar att skapa affärer som gör skillnad? Då har du chansen att ta nästa steg i din karriär hos TD SYNNEX - en global ledare inom IT-distribution.
   

  

 Rollen
   

  

 Som Business Development Manager för GCC (Global Computing Components) kommer du ingå i ett nordiskt team och blir en nyckelspelare i att driva vår försäljning i både Sverige och Norden. Du får möjlighet att arbeta med några av världens mest innovativa varumärken - Intel, AMD, Nvidia, Supermicro, Micron, Seagate och många fler.
   

  

 I rollen kommer du primärt att arbeta med områdena sever, storage och nätverk. Några av arbetsuppgifterna är:
   

* Proaktivt driva försäljningen av GCCs produktportfölj genom daglig kontakt med kunder
* Identifiera potentiella kunder och affärsmöjligheter
* Bygga relationer med kunder, tillverkare och andra team inom TD SYNNEX
* Planera och genomföra marknadsaktiviteter och go-to-market initiativ tillsammans med tillverkare
* Delta i försäljningsaktiviteter, evenemang och utbildningar


 För att lyckas i rollen ser vi att du är duktig på att skapa goda relationer och tar ett starkt ägendeskap för din affär. Som person måste du gilla att arbeta självständigt, du är ansvarsfull, strukturerad och sätter ambitiösa mål. Du ser värdet i att samarbeta och gillar att bygga relationer med partners och kollegor.
   

  

 Vi erbjuder dig med de rätta kvalifikationerna ett jobb i ett internationellt företag där ingen dag är den andra lik. Om det låter spännande med ett företag som präglas av högt tempo i en spännande marknad och har engagerade kollegor, är TD SYNNEX en attraktiv arbetsplats för dig. För rätt person finns det goda möjligheter att utvecklas både hos oss lokalt men även inom våra internationella team.
   

  

 Vi är stolta över att vara certifierade som A Great Place to Work, och har en grupp som heter Elevate med kollegor i Norden med fokus på könsmångfald. Dessutom arbetar vi aktivt med mångfald. Vi fokuserar på karriärutveckling och som en nordisk och global organisation har vi kollegor som nyligen har flyttat från lokala till nordiska roller som en del av karriären inom TD SYNNEX.
   

  

 Vi erbjuder också
   

* Konkurrenskraftig ersättning med regelbundna årliga löneöversyner.
* Hybridarbete - (3 dagar på kontoret, 2 dagar hemma)
* Vi värdesätter kontinuerligt lärande och erbjuder en tydlig utvecklingsplan.
* Omfattande förmåner, inklusive sjukförsäkring, betald ledighet, pensionsplaner och mer


 Ansökan och om du vill veta mer
   

  

 Skicka ditt CV via länken. Vi vill ha tjänsten tillsatt så snart som möjligt och ansökningarna behandlas därför löpande.
   

  

 Kom och bli en del av oss!
   

  

 TD SYNNEX hanterar rekryteringsprocessen själv och vill inte ha kontakt med rekryteringsbyråer.
   

  

  

  

  

  

**Key Skills**
 At TD SYNNEX, our values guide everything we do: Together, We Own It, We Dare to Go, We Grow and Win, and above all, We Do the Right Thing. These principles shape how we work with each other, our partners, and our communities as we drive innovation and create lasting impact.
   

  

**What's In It For You?**
* **Elective Benefits:** 
 Our programs are tailored to your country to best accommodate your lifestyle.
* **Grow Your Career:** 
 Accelerate your path to success (and keep up with the future) with formal programs on leadership and professional development, and many more on-demand courses.
* **Elevate Your Personal Well-Being:** 
 Boost your financial, physical, and mental well-being through seminars, events, and our global Life Empowerment Assistance Program.
* **Diversity, Equity & Inclusion:** 
 It's not just a phrase to us; valuing every voice is how we succeed. Join us in celebrating our global diversity through inclusive education, meaningful peer-to-peer conversations, and equitable growth and development opportunities.
* **Make the Most of our Global Organization** 
 : Network with other new co-workers within your first 30 days through our onboarding program.
* **Connect with Your Community:** 
 Participate in internal, peer-led inclusive communities and activities, including business resource groups, local volunteering events, and more environmental and social initiatives.


**Don't meet every single requirement? Apply anyway.**
 At TD SYNNEX, we're proud to be recognized as a great place to work and a leader in the promotion and practice of diversity, equity and inclusion. If you're excited about working for our company and believe you're a good fit for this role, we encourage you to apply. You may be exactly the person we're looking for!

title: Manager of Frontbook Sales, Medium Segment
description:
**Job Description**
**Shape the Future of Payments with Nexi in 2025**
 Envision a world where every transaction feels effortless, safe, and connected. At Nexi, we’re leading this transformation, building tools and solutions that redefine how the world pays. By joining us, you’ll play a part in creating the next generation of digital payments in an innovative, supportive, and international environment.
   

  

**Why This Role Is Right for You**
 As a
 **Head of Frontbook Medium Segment** 
 , MidCorp Sales, at Nets, means stepping into a position where impact, momentum, and leadership truly matter. Every day brings the opportunity to guide your team forward to success. Reviewing trends, spotting sales opportunities, and turning insights into action. You’ll be the driving force behind a culture of growth, motivation, and accountability. Ensuring that performance stays strong and that every lead and customer is handled with purpose.
   

  

 Through coaching, team engagement, and smart prioritization, you help shape a high-performing sales organization that thrives on clarity and direction. Your leadership ensures that processes are followed, talent is developed, and new colleagues feel empowered from day one. And by communicating insights from the field, you help steer the business toward even greater success.
   

  

 This is a role for
 **someone who wants to elevate others, inspire progress, and make a meaningful difference** 
 —every single week.
   

  

**About Your Future Role**
 In this position, you will:
   

  

* Monitor trends and deviations in business performance (BB)
* Secure strategic direction is implemented (FB)
* Own the daily execution and performance of the sales team
* Ensure CRM data quality and tool adoption
* Lead onboarding and support of new hires
* Provide feedback and insights to management


**What Makes You a Great Fit**
 We’re looking for someone eager to make a difference. Here’s what we value:
   

  

* Strong sales execution skills
* Skilled in team coaching and performance management
* Collaboration skills
* Payment market knowledge


 You don’t check every box;
 **your unique potential and willingness to learn** 
 could set you apart.
   

  

**What’s in it for you** 
 ?
   

  

* Attractive salary and a competitive benefits package to reward your expertise and contributions
* Tech equipment: Get the tools you need to succeed, including the latest technology to support your work
* Join an international team: Collaborate with experts from across Europe and bring your ideas to life in a dynamic, global environment
* Grow and develop: Gain hands-on experience and structured training through our PayTech University, designed to accelerate your career and help you reach your full potential


**Discover Life at Nexi**
 We’re an international team of 10,000+ people across 25 countries, united by shared ambition and a passion for innovation. Learn more about our culture, Values, and how we’re shaping the future of digital payments. Visit our Life at Nexi page.
   

  

**Diversity and Inclusion at Nexi**
 We are proud to be an equal opportunity employer: together, we succeed by embracing our differences and creating a future where everyone can thrive.
   

  

**Your Next Step Starts Here**
 If this opportunity excites you, we’d love to hear your story. Please submit your application today, and let’s shape the future of digital payments together!
   

  

**Responsibilities**
**QUALIFICATIONS**
**About Us**
 Are you interested in joining one of Europe's leading PayTech companies? Do you want to be part of a diverse team, collaborating with colleagues from across Europe? If so, you're in the right place!
   

  

**About The Team**
 We are the result of merging Nexi, Nets, and Sia, with a presence in over 25 countries. With over 80 years of experience, we offer plenty of opportunities for personal and professional growth
   

  

 At Nexi, we learn, adapt, and think like entrepreneurs. Discover more about our culture by visiting this page: https://www.nexigroup.com/en/people/life-at-nexi/overview/?utm\_source=career-platform&utm\_medium=job-openings&utm\_content=about-the-team

title: Head of Mobility and Classic Solutions Architecture
description:
**Why you should join our team**
 Are you passionate about leading architects that enable business growth in a dynamic, agile environment? If so, join Mobility and Classic Solutions, where we develop and maintain cutting-edge solutions for branded motor insurance partnerships. From branded web shops and mobile apps to API products and core insurance systems, we cover the entire customer journey and ensure the stability and scalability of our platforms.
   

  

 We are looking for a new colleague to be our new
 **Head of Mobility and Classic Solutions architecture** 
 unit.
   

  

**About This Role**
 In this position you will lead the unit’s architectural function which entails further shaping and securing the architectural direction, securing that we have a good collaborative environment with our stakeholders, and to secure that the team has the right competencies over time. You will help the area to align with strategies, shape the architecture direction and supporting them in reaching their goal by making the complex simple and efficiently adapting the message to different stakeholders needs.
   

  

**Architect @ If**
 The architect can see and understand things in a larger context. The architect understands the business strategy and the needs of our stakeholders and how that transcends into concrete solutions. One of its most appreciated abilities is to make thoughtful decisions, weighing the pros and cons, making the complex simpler. This leadership position is part of the IT Architecture unit in If. We make sure that we set common direction and have the building blocks in place to underpin business needs and strategies, in deep collaboration with cross-functional product and development teams.
   

  

**About The Team**
 The team currently consists of employees and consultants, two lead architects and 7 solution architects. The architects are located in Stockholm and Riga. The unit is part of the IT Architecture organization. Together, we ensure that architectural decisions are deeply aligned with both business needs and technical feasibility, fostering innovation and quality throughout the company.
   

  

**As Head of Mobility and Classic Solutions Architecture you will**
* Be part of If’s central architecture unit and report to Head of If Architecture Hub.
* Manage and partaking in key architectural deliveries and support the lead architects in driving the direction in your unit.
* Contribute to key strategic initiatives across If as needed.
* Recruit, coach, develop, and support highly skilled and motivated employees within the unit.
* Ensure we have the right relationships, interfaces and good collaboration with the stake holders.
* Secure that Mobility and Classic Solutions needs are discussed when affecting changes outside of the area are planned.
* Participate in relevant needed IT technical governance forums representing Mobility and Classic Solutions and relevant management teams.
* Support business and IT stakeholders in architecture related matters.
* Actively partake in the dialogue with the engineering managers in the area in order to support the overall IT delivery.
* Continuously develop your competencies and build your knowledge about architecture, technology and leadership.
* Collaborate with senior leadership to align enterprise solutions with overall business objectives securing their economic feasibility.
* Lead with a focus on delivering technology transformations with modern, cloud-based architecture, ensuring we take steps in the intended direction and clean up on the way.


**Our promise to you**
* You will drive and be part of highly valued, fun and challenging projects that will move If even further forward.
* You will have as much freedom as possible to accomplish your work – and the accountability that comes with it, but lots of support and great coworkers to help out.
* You will be part of a management team where we naturally share knowledge and know-how among each other on a regular basis and help each other succeed and grow.


**We believe that you**
* Are a curious team player with excellent communication and collaboration skills which you use in order to secure a common direction in the form of anchored roadmaps and execution of them.
* Have a big interest for the Insurance motor business and want to learn more.
* Have experience working with and driving architecture including leading other architects and following-up their deliveries whilst also yourself taking on solution architecture tasks in addition to working on the bigger picture.
* Might previously have worked as a developer where you built a strong technical experience that you have upkept. Furthermore, you have good knowledge in primarily Microsoft technologies and have experience of public cloud solutions like Azure, AWS and Google Cloud.
* Have experience as an architect with development of distributed systems in a complex enterprise setting.
* Have previously held a manager position with personnel responsibility.
* Thrill to work in a fast-paced environment where you make use of your experience to have a strategic mindset also while supporting the operative work.
* Have the ability to relate and make informed architectural decisions and recommendations to business needs and thrive when working in the intersection between business and IT development.


**When asking our colleagues why they choose to work here, they responded …**
* “The possibility to develop myself and learn new things and interesting technical environment”
* “Great colleagues and flexibility”
* “Good team spirit”
* “Good work environment”
* “Life balance – working with quality not quantity”
* “Big investment in IT”
* “Good leadership”
* “Nordic and future oriented company”


**Additional Facts And Recruitment Process**
**Application deadline:** 
 Screening and interviewing will start early January. However, deadline to apply is 31st of January.
   

**Work location:** 
 Stockholm, Bergshamra
   

**To apply for the position:** 
 Please attach both your CV and answer the questions in the application form.
   

**Travelling:** 
 The team is distributed across several offices so occasional travel is part of the role.
   

  

**Start:** 
 As soon as possible/by agreement.
   

  

 For more information regarding the position, please contact Tomas Sylverberg, e-mail: tomas.sylverberg@if.se
   

  

 Headhunting and consultancy firms are humbly prompted not to respond to this job ad!

title: Finnish-speaking Customer Advisor to Collections
description:
**Are you a great listener with a genuine desire to help others?** 
 At Collections you will get the chance to build your communication skills, work closely with a fantastic team, and develop valuable knowledge in credit and risk – all in a fun, energetic and inclusive environment where your voice is heard and your growth matters. 🌱
   

  

 The Collections team is a vital part of our business. By phone we proactively reach out to customers who have fallen behind on their payments and support them in finding the best way forward. Sometimes it is a simple fix and other times it means building a long-term plan together. You will also take incoming calls from customers who need help. While there is some administration involved in the role, this is mainly a phone-based service role where your communication skills truly make a difference.
   

  

**About The Role**
 As a Customer Advisor, you will play a key role in helping our customers get back on track. You will communicate with empathy, find solutions together with the customer, and contribute to a positive and proactive team environment. At the same time, it is important that you feel confident setting clear expectations – and when needed, making firm but respectful demands regarding overdue payments. 🤝
   

  

**Main tasks**
* Make outbound calls to customers who have overdue payments
* Guide customers toward sustainable payment solutions
* Handle incoming calls and assist with questions or concerns
* Perform light administration linked to customer cases
* Contribute to a customer-first mindset with a warm and professional attitude


**Who are you?**
* You speak Finnish and English fluently
* You have experience in customer service, preferably over the phone


**It Is a Bonus If**
* You also speak Swedish
* You have worked with Collections or Pre-collections


**We Also Believe That You Are**
**Service-oriented & communicative:** 
 You have the ability to listen and understand different people’s needs while also having the confidence to set clear expectations in conversations. 🌱
   

  

**Results-driven:** 
 You are motivated by achieving results and goals, such as customer satisfaction. 🏆
   

  

**Flexible:** 
 You can adapt to different situations that arise at work and excel at prioritizing tasks. 🤸‍♀️
   

  

 In addition to this, it is important to us that you recognize yourself in our values: we are wholehearted, we collaborate and we take the lead.
   

  

**Have you heard of NOBAVERSE?**
 In our NOBAVERSE, we value openness, trust, and diversity. Here, you can influence your own development and have fun along the way to achieving our goals – all in a workplace that’s a little extra
 *bubbly* 
 ! ✨
   

  

 Read more about our employee value proposition on our
 **careers page.**
**Practical Information**
 Form of employment: Permanent employment with 6 months probation period.
   

  

 Working hours: 7.30-16.
   

  

 Read more further down!
   

  

**Read more about how our recruitment process works in the FAQ.**
 We care for your privacy and, with reference to the GDPR, would like to ask you not to include any sensitive personal data in your application, for examples information about ethnic origin, political opinions, religious beliefs or information about your health.
   

  

**Read more about how we handle your personal data here.**
 If you have any questions or concerns about the position, please contact the responsible recruiter.
   

  

 We look forward to receiving your application! 🙏✨

title: DevOps-arkitekt med bakgrund inom utveckling
description:
**Företagsbeskrivning**
 AFRY erbjuder tjänster inom teknik, design, digitalisering och rådgivning. Vi är hängivna experter inom industri, energi- och infrastruktur, som skapar värde för kommande generationer. AFRY har en global räckvidd med djupa rötter i Norden. Tillsammans accelererar vi omställningen till ett mer hållbart samhälle.
   

  

**Jobbeskrivning**
 Vi söker en .NET-utvecklare som samtidigt har gedigen erfarenhet av DevOps, Linux och on-prem infrastruktur. Det här är en roll för dig som trivs i komplexa miljöer där hög tillgänglighet, resiliens och stabil drift är centralt.
   

  

 Uppdraget är
 **säkerhetsklassat** 
 , vilket innebär att du kommer att arbeta i en miljö där stabilitet, robusthet, integritet och tillgänglighet är absolut centralt.
   

  

 Du kommer att arbeta i en miljö där applikationer och system byggs och körs i
 **egen-managed Kubernetes (on-prem)** 
 , i kombination med moderna utvecklingsstackar som
 **C# .NET** 
 ,
 **TypeScript** 
 och
 **containerbaserade plattformar** 
 . Uppdraget kräver både utvecklingskompetens och förmågan att hantera den tekniska infrastrukturen runt applikationen.
   

  

 Det här är en tekniskt utmanande och bred roll där du både utvecklar, designar, optimerar och säkrar robusta lösningar i produktion – tillsammans med ett senior tekniskt team.
   

  

**Kvalifikationer**
 I rollen kommer du bland annat att:
   

  

* Utveckla lösningar i C# .NET samt viss utveckling i TypeScript
* Arbeta med on-prem Kubernetes-kluster, inklusive drift, underhåll och optimering
* Designa och implementera lösningar med fokus på hög tillgänglighet, resiliens och robusthet
* Hantera Linux-miljöer, systemadministration och felsökning
* Arbeta med DevOps-principer och CI/CD-flöden
* Automatisera bygg-, test- och deployprocesser
* Arbeta med containerteknologier (Docker, container registry, certifikat)
* Samarbeta nära arkitekter och andra utvecklare för att säkerställa en stabil och modern plattform


**Kvalifikationer – måste ha**
 ✔
 **Minst 4 års erfarenhet av DevOps-arbete eller som SRE (Site Reliability Engineer)**
 ✔ Minst
 **3–4 års erfarenhet** 
 av .NET-utveckling
   

  

 ✔ Djup förståelse för
 **Linux** 
 och skriptning/automation
   

  

 ✔ Erfarenhet av
 **Kubernetes (gärna on-prem / native clusters)**
 ✔ Praktisk erfarenhet av att bygga och hantera
 **CI/CD pipelines**
 ✔ Erfarenhet av containers (Docker) och produktionssättning
   

  

 ✔ Erfarenhet av felsökning i komplexa miljöer
   

  

 ✔ Flytande svenska i tal och skrift
   

  

 ✔ Svenskt medborgarskap (krav för säkerhetsklassning)
   

  

 ✔ Godkänd säkerhetsprövning eller möjlighet att genomgå en
   

  

**Personliga egenskaper**
* Strukturerad och noggrann, särskilt i säkerhetsklassade miljöer
* Problemlösare som gillar teknisk komplexitet
* Självgående men samtidigt en god lagspelare
* Analytisk, kvalitetsmedveten och ansvarstagande


**Ytterligare information**
 Vår enhet Digital Services verkar över hela utvecklingskedjan med experter inom projektledning, kravanalys, QA och test, systemutveckling, arkitektur, dataanalys och AI, cybersäkerhet med mera.
   

  

 Vad erbjuder AFRY dig som anställd?
   

  

 Vi har regelbundna träffar där temat varierar mellan kompetens och socialt utbyte, eller både och. En bra balans helt enkelt!
   

  

 Du får t.ex.:
   

  

* En AFRY Buddy som bollplank under din första tid som anställd
* Balans i arbetslivet med möjlighet till hybridarbete.
* Tillgång till Club AFRY där en bredd av spännande och underhållande aktiviteter för våra medarbetare anordnas - det finns något för alla! Läs gärna mer här.
* Konkurrenskraftiga förmåner gällande pension, friskvård och föräldraledighet reglerade i vårt kollektivavtal
* Företagsrabatter med externa partners genom vår förmånsportal Advantage You.
* Friskvårdsbidrag 4500 SEK/år.
* Restauranger och kaféer på plats
* Ett enormt nätverk av tekniska experter med +19 000 kollegor runtom i världen.


**Välkommen med din ansökan, sista ansökningsdag är 2026-01-12**
**Kontaktperson för frågor:**
 Aamir Faried, Gruppchef
   

  

 aamir.faried@afry.com
   

  

 Vi undanber oss direktkontakt med bemannings- och rekryteringsföretag samt säljare av ytterligare jobbannonser.
   

  

*På AFRY driver vi förändring i allt vi gör. Vi anser att förändring sker när modiga idéer möts, när vi samarbetar, skapar innovation och omfamnar kreativa lösningar, det är så vi skapar framtiden. Vi söker konstant kvalificerade kandidater som vill ansluta sig till våra inkluderande team runt om i världen. Bli en del av oss och påskynda den gröna omställningen*

title: Cloud Architect AWS - Migration Delivery
description:
Choosing Capgemini means choosing a company where you will be empowered to shape your career in the way you’d like, where you’ll be supported and inspired by a collaborative community of colleagues around the world, and where you’ll be able to reimagine what’s possible. Join us and help the world’s leading organizations unlock the value of technology and build a more sustainable, more inclusive world.
   

  

**Din roll**
 Vill du vara med och forma framtidens molnlösningar?
   

  

 Du blir en del av Capgeminis Cloud & Infrastructure Services (CIS)-enhet med fokus på projekt- och konsulttjänster i Norden. Vårt mål är att erbjuda kunder helhetslösningar inom Cloud och vi erbjuder en mängd olika tjänster till våra kunder, från strategisk rådgivning till projektgenomförande.
   

  

*I denna roll kommer du ha en nyckelroll i att:*
* Leda vår kund genom mainframe moderniseringsinitiativ
* Driva komplexa migreringsprojekt
* Samarbeta med intressenter för att samla in krav och föreslå effektiva migrationsstrategier
* Agera som en betrodd rådgivare till kunder gällande branschtrender och ny teknik
* Dela kunskap inom organisationen genom mentorskap, utbildning och skapande av återanvändbara artefakter


**Din Profil**
* Minst 5 års erfarenhet av molnarkitektur och implementering
* Praktisk teknisk erfarenhet av mainframe, non-x86 legacy system och av teknologier som COBOL, JCL, CICS, DB2 för z/OS, Assembler, PL/I, Java, Rexx, flat/sequential files, GDGs och VSAM
* Dokumenterad erfarenhet av en teknisk roll med att migrera workloads från mainframe och non-x86 legacy systems till distribuerade x86 infrastrukturer antingen on-prem eller till cloud lösning.
* God erfarenhet av att integrera mainframe och non-x86 legacy system med distribuerade Linux- eller Windows-baserade x86-servrar
* Flytande i Svenska och engelska, både i tal och skrift


 Önskvärda kvalifikationer:
   

  

* AWS-certifieringar på associate- eller professionell nivå (t.ex. Solutions Architect Associate eller Professional, DevOps Engineer Professional) är meriterande
* Erfarenhet av att leda kunder i initiativ för modernisering av mainframe och legacy system
* Erfarenhet av verktyg och metoder som används för att migrera mainframe workloads via hårdvaru-/mellanvaruemulering, automatiserad kodkonvertering, and re-platforming.
* Erfarenhet av att analysera och implementera lokala on-prem mainframes applikationer och datalager för modernisering av workloads


**Vad vi tror kommer få dig att trivas:**
* Konkurrenskraftig lön, förmånliga tjänstepensioner och kollektivavtal som ger trygghet
* Fokus på din hälsa och ditt välmående, med initiativ för att skapa balans mellan jobb och fritid
* En arbetsmiljö med kollegor som stöttar och inspirerar varandra, och chefer som har ditt bästa i fokus
* Brett utbud av karriärmöjligheter och tillgång till Capgeminis stora utbildningskatalog, särskilt inom den senaste teknologin för t.ex. cloud och generativ AI
* En företagskultur där mångfald och inkludering värdesätts högt


**Ansökan**
*I denna rekrytering hanterar vi ansökningar löpande. Som en del av vår rekryteringsprocess kommer identitetskontroll att genomföras genom granskning av ditt ID-kort, och bakgrundskontroller kan utföras vid behov. Vid frågor om tjänsten är du välkommen att kontakta ansvarig rekryterare Jessica Fogelsjöö, Jessica.fogelsjoo@capgemini.com.*
 Till denna roll söker vi medarbetare för säkerhetsklassat uppdrag placerad hos kund.
   

  

 Capgemini is a global business and technology transformation partner, helping organizations to accelerate their dual transition to a digital and sustainable world, while creating tangible impact for enterprises and society. It is a responsible and diverse group of 340,000 team members in more than 50 countries. With its strong over 55-year heritage, Capgemini is trusted by its clients to unlock the value of technology to address the entire breadth of their business needs. It delivers end-to-end services and solutions leveraging strengths from strategy and design to engineering, all fueled by its market leading capabilities in AI, generative AI, cloud and data, combined with its deep industry expertise and partner ecosystem.

title: Infrastructure Engineer on Mainframe platform at SEB in Stockholm
description:
Are you interested in working with SEB Mainframe environment that is facing major changes? Are you a driven system programmer with experience from working with mainframe infrastructure? Do you want to work proactively with modernization and enhancements? If so, this might be a great opportunity for you!
   

  

 We are looking for an engineer/system programmer who will be part of a team working with Mainframe infrastructure and belonging services to the Mainframe platform. The team is part of SEB Technology and located in Solna in the Stockholm area. Mainframe is a vital platform within SEB where we work a lot with modernization and where many different initiatives are ongoing connected to Mainframe platform. At SEB we strive towards a modern Mainframe environment well aligned with our digital roadmap.
   

  

**About The Role**
 As an engineer/system programmer, you will work with maintaining and managing the servers and other belonging hardware, as well as OS and related software products, for best performance and optimization. You will be responsible, together with the team, for daily maintenance, support and technical development of the mainframe platform. Maintenance and operation of mainframe infrastructure is of outmost importance as many critical applications for the bank are running on the platform. Also new requirements on IT delivery put new demands on different solutions for fulfilling them. The team has scheduled on-call 7/24 and that will also be included in this role when suitable.
   

  

**To thrive in this role, we believe you have**
* At least 3 years’ experience regarding Mainframe platform as a system programmer
* Knowledge of IBM Z hardware, z/OS, SMP, HCD, VTAM, TCP/IP
* Experience within GDPS is meritorious
* Fluent in Swedish and English


 You are analytic and structured in your work and understand the importance in following processes when working in critical environments. Cooperation in the team is important, as the team has great own responsibility for their deliveries. In addition, the ability to independently run your own activities and take responsibility for them is necessary. Enjoy working with colleagues, developing as an engineer and have a positive ‘can-do’ attitude is of great importance.
   

  

**What We Offer**
 We offer many experiences and benefits to our employees, and there is nuance to every individual’s career experience, but the elements that define the core of our offering are:
   

  

* Friendly and welcoming culture
* Innovative company at the forefront of technology
* Agile and modern way of working
* Extensive training and learning opportunities
* We apply a hybrid model where we work both from the office and home


**Recruitment process**
 We select candidates continuously, feel free to send in your application today, but no later than 7th of January. If you have any questions about the position, please contact hiring manger Anneli Risberg, by email (anneli.risberg@seb.se)
   

  

 SEB Sweden has a redeployment responsibility, why this position might be covered by internal redeployment.
   

  

 Please be aware that our final candidates undergo background checks, a process that includes, for example, identity control, verification of qualifications, credit checks, company engagements and criminal records checks. In some cases, we also apply random drug tests.
   

  

*Learn more about working at SEB on our Career website or through our Career podcasts.*
 https://sebgroup.com/career
   

  

 https://bit.ly/SEBcareer

title: Senior Solutions Engineer
description:
**About NetApp**
 NetApp is the intelligent data infrastructure company, turning a world of disruption into opportunity for every customer. No matter the data type, workload or environment, we help our customers identify and realize new business possibilities. And it all starts with our people.
   

  

 If this sounds like something you want to be part of, NetApp is the place for you. You can help bring new ideas to life, approaching each challenge with fresh eyes. Of course, you won't be doing it alone. At NetApp, we're all about asking for help when we need it, collaborating with others, and partnering across the organization - and beyond.
   

  

**Job Summary**
 As a Senior Solutions Engineer, you determine customer needs for solutions and services from NetApp. You analyze customer requirements and convert them into technical solution concepts. You can present NetApp technologies to customers at different levels of responsibility, adapt to the interlocutors and question their motives and motivational factors. You not only support sales in the first technical customer discussions but are also responsible for the technical elaboration of the solutions offered.
   

  

 Job Requirements
   

  

 Your area of responsibility includes the technical representation of NetApp and in particular the analysis of existing cloud, IT, network, application, backup and storage landscapes at customers. In the role of a Trusted Advisor, you are responsible for developing solution concepts and architectures, which you will present to a larger audience as part of a technical customer presentation. Active contact with customers in cooperation with the responsible Client Executive and ensuring that technically complex inquiries are handled competently and implemented professionally are the focus of this task.
   

  

 Education
   

  

 Are you enthusiastic about innovative technology and would you like to constantly develop yourself?
   

  

 Do you find it easy to explain complex issues and do you find yourself in the following points?
   

  

* Interest in current trends in IT and technologies used (e.g. public clouds, hybrid clouds, container technologies, DevOps concepts, artificial intelligence)
* High motivation to actively advise our customers on their path to digital transformation and to develop joint solutions
* You can think analytically, are creative and team-oriented
* You like to bring different people together and work towards a common goal
* IT knowledge, including in enterprise/cloud computing, virtualization, storage, backup or high availability solutions
* Knowledge of storage technologies is desirable
* Successfully completed technical training or technical studies with appropriate professional experience
* Very good knowledge of Swedish and English Language


 At NetApp, we embrace a hybrid working environment designed to strengthen connection, collaboration, and culture for all employees. This means that most roles will have some level of in-office and/or in-person expectations, which will be shared during the recruitment process.
   

  

 At NetApp, we embrace a hybrid working environment designed to strengthen connection, collaboration, and culture for all employees. This means that most roles will have some level of in-office and/or in-person expectations, which will be shared during the recruitment process.
   

  

**Equal Opportunity Employer:**
 NetApp is firmly committed to Equal Employment Opportunity (EEO) and to compliance with all laws that prohibit employment discrimination based on age, race, color, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, religion, disability or genetic information, pregnancy, and any protected classification.
   

  

**Why NetApp?**
 We are all about helping customers turn challenges into business opportunity. It starts with bringing new thinking to age-old problems, like how to use data most effectively to run better - but also to innovate. We tailor our approach to the customer's unique needs with a combination of fresh thinking and proven approaches.
   

  

 We enable a healthy work-life balance. Our volunteer time off program is best in class, offering employees 40 hours of paid time per year to volunteer with their favourite organizations. We provide comprehensive medical, dental, wellness, and vision plans for you and your family. We offer educational assistance, legal services, and access to discounts. Finally, we provide financial savings programs to help you plan for your future.
   

  

 If you want to help us build knowledge and solve big problems, let's talk.

title: Backend Engineer
description:
**The Company**
 PayPal has been revolutionizing commerce globally for more than 25 years. Creating innovative experiences that make moving money, selling, and shopping simple, personalized, and secure, PayPal empowers consumers and businesses in approximately 200 markets to join and thrive in the global economy.
   

  

 We operate a global, two-sided network at scale that connects hundreds of millions of merchants and consumers. We help merchants and consumers connect, transact, and complete payments, whether they are online or in person. PayPal is more than a connection to third-party payment networks. We provide proprietary payment solutions accepted by merchants that enable the completion of payments on our platform on behalf of our customers.
   

  

 We offer our customers the flexibility to use their accounts to purchase and receive payments for goods and services, as well as the ability to transfer and withdraw funds. We enable consumers to exchange funds more safely with merchants using a variety of funding sources, which may include a bank account, a PayPal or Venmo account balance, PayPal and Venmo branded credit products, a credit card, a debit card, certain cryptocurrencies, or other stored value products such as gift cards, and eligible credit card rewards. Our PayPal, Venmo, and Xoom products also make it safer and simpler for friends and family to transfer funds to each other. We offer merchants an end-to-end payments solution that provides authorization and settlement capabilities, as well as instant access to funds and payouts. We also help merchants connect with their customers, process exchanges and returns, and manage risk. We enable consumers to engage in cross-border shopping and merchants to extend their global reach while reducing the complexity and friction involved in enabling cross-border trade.
   

  

 Our beliefs are the foundation for how we conduct business every day. We live each day guided by our core values of Inclusion, Innovation, Collaboration, and Wellness. Together, our values ensure that we work together as one global team with our customers at the center of everything we do – and they push us to ensure we take care of ourselves, each other, and our communities.
   

  

**Job Description Summary:**
 As PayPal continues its mission to revolutionize commerce, we’re looking for a passionate Backend Engineer to join our Native E-commerce team in Stockholm. In this role, you’ll take on meaningful technical challenges and work closely with cross-functional teams to build products that empower millions of merchants worldwide. If this sounds exciting, read on — the best is yet to come!
   

  

**Job Description:**
**Essential Responsibilities:**
* Delivers complete solutions spanning all phases of the Software Development Lifecycle (SDLC) (design, implementation, testing, delivery and operations), based on definitions from more senior roles.
* Advises immediate management on project-level issues
* Guides junior engineers
* Operates with little day-to-day supervision, making technical decisions based on knowledge of internal conventions and industry best practices
* Applies knowledge of technical best practices in making decisions


**Expected Qualifications:**
* 3+ years relevant experience and a Bachelor’s degree OR Any equivalent combination of education and experience.


**Additional Responsibilities And Preferred Qualifications**
**Meet our Team**
 The Native E-commerce team is building the foundation for a new way to sell online. Our mission is to make it effortless for micro-merchants and small businesses to launch and grow their online stores. We’re combining conversational AI for intuitive store setup, flexible backend services, and seamless PayPal payments to help anyone start selling in minutes and scale as they grow. This role is an unique opportunity for your to contribute in shaping the future of commerce.
   

  

**Your day-to-day**
 As a Backend Engineer, you’ll contribute to designing and delivering high-quality solutions while learning from and collaborating closely with your team. Your day-to-day will include:
   

  

* Developing and implementing solutions with growing ownership and confidence.
* Making thoughtful technical decisions and seeking feedback or guidance when needed.
* Balancing trade-offs in system design, scalability, and performance.
* Breaking down complex problems, asking the right questions, and helping to shape practical solutions.
* Contributing to team discussions, sharing ideas, and helping improve how the team builds and delivers software.


**What You Need To Succeed**
* Solid experience with RESTful API development and microservice architecture.
* Hands-on work with Java and familiarity with testing frameworks and practices.
* Understanding of system design fundamentals and production-grade backend systems.


**Get bonus points if you also have...**
* Experience with Kotlin and deploying to cloud platforms (AWS, GCP, Azure, or similar).
* Exposure to containerization (Docker) and Infrastructure as Code (Terraform).
* Familiarity with monitoring and logging tools such as Grafana or Datadog.
* Understanding or experience with event-driven architecture or message-based systems.


**We Believe in You**
 Interested in knowing more? Don't hesitate to apply and/or let's talk – we'd love to get to know you!
   

  

 \_
   

  

 PayPal does not charge candidates any fees for courses, applications, resume reviews, interviews, background checks, or onboarding. Any such request is a red flag and likely part of a scam. To learn more about how to identify and avoid recruitment fraud please visit https://careers.pypl.com/contact-us.
   

  

 For the majority of employees, PayPal's balanced hybrid work model offers 3 days in the office for effective in-person collaboration and 2 days at your choice of either the PayPal office or your home workspace, ensuring that you equally have the benefits and conveniences of both locations.
   

  

**Our Benefits:**
 At PayPal, we’re committed to building an equitable and inclusive global economy. And we can’t do this without our most important asset-you. That’s why we offer benefits to help you thrive in every stage of life. We champion your financial, physical, and mental health by offering valuable benefits and resources to help you care for the whole you.
   

  

 We have great benefits including a flexible work environment, employee shares options, health and life insurance and more. To learn more about our benefits please visit https://www.paypalbenefits.com
   

  

**Who We Are:**
 To learn more about our culture and community visit https://about.pypl.com/who-we-are/default.aspx
   

  

**Commitment to Diversity and Inclusion**
 PayPal provides equal employment opportunity (EEO) to all persons regardless of age, color, national origin, citizenship status, physical or mental disability, race, religion, creed, gender, sex, pregnancy, sexual orientation, gender identity and/or expression, genetic information, marital status, status with regard to public assistance, veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by federal, state, or local law. In addition, PayPal will provide reasonable accommodations for qualified individuals with disabilities. If you are unable to submit an application because of incompatible assistive technology or a disability, please contact us at paypalglobaltalentacquisition@paypal.com.
   

  

**Belonging at PayPal:**
 Our employees are central to advancing our mission, and we strive to create an environment where everyone can do their best work with a sense of purpose and belonging. Belonging at PayPal means creating a workplace with a sense of acceptance and security where all employees feel included and valued. We are proud to have a diverse workforce reflective of the merchants, consumers, and communities that we serve, and we continue to take tangible actions to cultivate inclusivity and belonging at PayPal.
